item.title: HHC24 - Snowball-Showdown
item.description:
Bronze ðŸ¥‰ Link to heading

Raring to go? Terrific! Here's a real brain tickler. Navigator of chaos or maestro of subtlety, which will you be? Either way, remember our objective: bring victory to Alabaster.

  • There is a hint from Dusty Giftwrap: Adjust the right elements and victory for Alabaster can be secured with more subtlety. Intriguing, right? Means: That we would need to alter the client-side values in JS or in cookies as usual for this kind of challenges.
